dashboard.label: Bad SVG examples
dashboard.description: Examples of SVG being rendered incorrectly

panel.title: Bad SVG with invalid XML and debug enabled

viz.title: When debug is enabled messages sent to browser javascript console

search.query: | makeresults | eval svg_viz = "<<<<<<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='100' height='100'> <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' style='fill: green;'></circle> </svg>"

viz.title: Visualization has nothing to render as no events to build svg_viz string from

search.query: | makeresults | where event="does not exist" | eval svg_viz = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' style='fill: green;'></circle></svg>"

viz.title: Visualization has nothing to render as svg_viz field does not exist

search.query: | makeresults | eval svg_viz_bad = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' style='fill:green;'></circle></svg>"

panel.title: Passed into field into svg_viz does not exist

viz.title: Unable to build svg_viz string as dependent field does not exist

search.query: | makeresults | eval color = "green" | eval svg_viz = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' style='fill:".bad_color.";'></circle></svg>"

viz.title: How the SVG should be rendered

search.query: | makeresults | eval svg_viz = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' style='fill: green;'></circle></svg>"
